text: we talked to customers a lot about
migration and migrating their entire IT
estate AWS and the most common question
that we get is how do we get started
this feels like a massive effort and
where do we start how do we begin how do
we know what we don't know that's
another question that we get quite often
and so the one of the things that I did
I tell what customers a lot is you want
to start with something that you can
really put your arms around there's a
number of moving parts and one of the
initiatives that we started was called
MRP or migration and readiness and
planning it's a bit of a misnomer
because in reality it's it's not really
about planning it's about mobilization
and it's about learning by doing and
having that experience and building that
confidence and not just in the
technology but primarily in the people
and the people that are going to be
operating in this new environment
getting to a place where they understand
what they're going to be doing what
those rules like how processes are going
to change how tools are going to change
how they can continue to add value in
this new environment and so we created
this initiative and in this project that
really is built around increasing that
confidence by action
you
